reviews.review: Its not your typical movie. Its an amazing work of art and could be considered a social event where freinds and families come together to watch Earths mightiest heroes fight to save the universe. Great. Great movie.

Superhero Magnolia. Amazing job in weaving the stories and momentum. It does not stand alone as a solo film, but that's kind of a given at this point. Great Marvel formula as always and it uses a twist we need to wait and see if it breaks it.

This film is a complete turd.  It is at least an hour longer than it needs to be. The characters are two dimensional and you wind up sympathising with the villain.  It seems that they have blown the budget on the special effects and forgotten to hire any script writers.  Avoid.
Best comic book movie, ever.... hands down!  I will count the days until Avengers 4!
Flaws? Whatever! This movie was so much fun, YES FUN! Think of it more as an episode of TV rather than a stand alone film. Cinematic history has been made.

Not a patch on Thor Ragnarok; there are some great moments in this, like Starlord trying to out-macho Thor and some classic one-liners: "Can it, Grimace" but too many boring flat-spots like the entire Vision/Scarlet Witch arc.  The best thing about the movie was the Black Order, especially Ebony Maw - I've lost interest in the Avengers themselves.
What is there to say but oh my God if you haven't seen this movie yet at least two times you got to see it over and over again I can't wait for the Blu-ray

Movie ending that was unexpected from the franchise? ... only if it is end. ;)

This big movie franchise has captivated the attention of audiences world over. Been a fan of the series since the 1st Avengers movie. But was not fan of the 2015 movie Avengers: Age of Ultron as it was a regular charade of fighting of big bad villains.

This movie was quite different experience than its prequel. The big cast line up is amazing. Story was bit stretched in certain parts but at normal space mostly. Non-stop back to back plots keeps the interest in the movie.

Fate of most characters don't look good but the sequel will reveal the what really happened to them. :P Overall a good action movie for this summer.

It's a challenge I feel to have a movie with so many stars and still pull off a somewhat decent movie.. but somehow Disney and marvel pulled it off. Great movie! Emotion, action, funny and entertaining. Best Avengers by far. 5 stars and must watch
Best movie I have seen this year, nothing will ever topple this movie! They made me feel for Thanos!!
